Player History
Drafted in 7th round, 134th overall pick, by San Francisco in 1972...
Drafted in 1st round, 2nd overall pick, by Philadelphia in 1973...
Injured on 4/2/1975 with a Strained Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Earned first career win on 5/2/1976...
Injured on 7/8/1978 with a Sore Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 5/1/1979 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for 7 weeks...
Injured on 8/8/1983 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for 8 weeks...
Won World Series with Philadelphia in 1984...
Signed as a free agent by California on 2/7/1986 to a 1-year deal worth $7,500,001 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 2/18/1987 to a 2-year deal worth $3,500,000 per year...
